column4: just installed 9.10 with encryption and it won't boot, /dev/mapper/crypt1p1 does not exist, any idea how to fix this?
does it say something about the floppy?
do you know what the fix is?
i can't find the website but i've got the printout right here
i'm booting a livecd now to take a look at the grub config
i had to edit out the line about "no floppy" at the grub screen to get it to boot, then go in and remove the line as root
so what do i do? remove the floppy line?
i had ubuntu 9.10 on here but the sound was awful do i'm using ubuntu 9.04 again
how am i going to mount it?
can't seem to pause grub, it just boots
did you click enter or try rebooting
do i need to edit a file in /boot or in / ?
i din't like ubuntu 9.10 on account of the sound quality
